mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_agenda (name, date, userid, mid, remark, domain, creater, modifier) VALUES (#{name}, #{date}, #{userid}, #{mid}, #{remark}, #{domain}, #{creater}, #{modifier})
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_agenda SET name = #{name}, date = #{date}, userid = #{userid}, mid = #{mid}, remark = #{remark}, modifier = #{modifier} WHERE id = #{id}
